pacific-1.description: The list of tokens on mainnet (pacific-1)

atlantic-2.description: The list of tokens on testnet (atlantic-2)

arctic-1.description: The list of tokens on devnet (arctic-1)

sei-devnet-3.description: The list of tokens on sei-devnet-3

description.description: A short description about the token

denom_units.description: The denominations in which the Token is commonly recognized or used.

base.description: The base identifier of this token. This should be the contract address for cw20/erc20 tokens, or the base denom for tokenfactory and ibc tokens.

display.description: The display name of the token

name.description: The name of the token. This field is used as a unique identifier in this assetlist.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol for the token (eg SEI)

images.description: Images of various file formats of the asset's logo

coingecko_id.description: [OPTIONAL] The coingecko id to fetch asset data from coingecko v3 api. See https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/list

type_asset.description: [OPTIONAL] The potential options for type of asset. By default, assumes sdk.coin

denom_unitA.description: A type of denomination where the exponent is always 0

denom.description: The possible denomination of this token

exponent.description: The exponent of this denom - Should be 0

denom_unitB.description: A type of denomination with an explicit exponent

denom.description: The possible denomination of this token

exponent.description: The exponent n of this denom, where 1 of this denom = 10^n of the base denom. For example, usei (the base denom) has exponent of 0 while sei has an exponent of 6 since 1sei is 1000000usei
